snippet.title: CLASH : Heroes Of Feralia Terra | Gameplay Demo Showcase | Part 1
snippet.description:
A first look at the universe of Clash: Heroes Of Feralia Terra, #UE5 demo build. With Lumen, Nanite, #RTXON enhancing the experience.  

ABOUT THE GAME
A third-person survival Hack ’n’ Slash Shooter, from #ArtnrollGames inspired by the works of Robert E. Howard world. The game is set in a world besieged by cosmic alien creatures and as the final hope of your world, you shall venture forth alone or with others to confront the hordes of deadly cosmic foes and formidable bosses, striving to survive and save your world.

MORE DAILY CONTENT : https://linktr.ee/Artnrollgames

WISHLIST THE GAME
STEAM STORE : https://store.steampowered.com/app/2512550/CLASH/
EPIC GAMES : https://store.epicgames.com/en-US/p/clash-5f995e

#actionRPG #indiegames #gamedev #indiedev 

Genre: Action RPG Adventure, Third-Person Hack ’n’ Slash Shooter
Platform: PC more platforms TBA
Engine: Unreal Engine 5
Stage: In Development
Release date: TBA
